info: This file should be used only in a local (outside Git) environment.
Note that since it is in '.gitignore' file, every time you pull code from the repo it will be overwritten.
Copy values here from Development or Production configuration.
Seems like '.gitignore' doesn't work. Run this command in the project root directory: git update-index --assume-unchanged EnterpriseBot.Api/GameSettings.Local.json
